statements: SELECT * FROM travel_itinerary;
SELECT destination, start_date FROM travel_itinerary WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM travel_itinerary WHERE end_date < '2023-01-15' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT itinerary_id, destination FROM travel_itinerary WHERE destination = 'Paris';
SELECT destination, start_date, end_date FROM travel_itinerary WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01' AND end_date <= '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM travel_itinerary WHERE destination = 'Paris';
SELECT destination, start_date, end_date FROM travel_itinerary WHERE start_date >= '2022-09-01';
SELECT * FROM travel_itinerary WHERE end_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT destination, accommodation_details FROM travel_itinerary WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(accommodation_details, '{"hotel": "Marriott"}');
SELECT itinerary_id, destination, accommodation_details->>'hotel_name' AS hotel_name FROM travel_itinerary ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM travel_itineraries;
SELECT id, destination, departure_date, return_date FROM travel_itineraries WHERE id = 1;
SELECT destination, return_date, departure_date FROM travel_itineraries WHERE destination = 'Paris';
SELECT id, accommodation_name, check_in_date FROM accommodation_details WHERE check_out_date > '2022-10-15';
SELECT id, itinerary_id, accommodation_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM accommodation_details WHERE itinerary_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM travel_itineraries WHERE destination = 'Paris';
SELECT destination, departure_date FROM travel_itineraries WHERE departure_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT accommodation_name, check_in_date FROM accommodation_details ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM accommodation_details;

SELECT destination, departure_date, accommodation_name FROM travel_itineraries JOIN accommodation_details ON travel_itineraries.id = accommodation_details.itinerary_id WHERE check_out_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM travel_itineraries;
SELECT destination, end_date, start_date FROM travel_itineraries WHERE itinerary_id = 1;
SELECT accommodation_name, address FROM accommodation_details WHERE check_in >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT nomad_name, nationality FROM nomad_profiles WHERE nomad_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM accommodation_details ORDER BY check_in DESC;
SELECT * FROM travel_itineraries ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT accommodation_name, address FROM accommodation_details WHERE check_in < '2022-09-01';
SELECT nomad_name, nationality FROM nomad_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT destination, start_date, end_date FROM travel_itineraries WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-08-31' ORDER BY end_date;
SELECT nomad_name, email FROM nomad_profiles WHERE nationality = 'USA' ORDER BY nomad_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM travel_itineraries;
SELECT destination, start_date FROM travel_itineraries ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT itinerary_id, destination, end_date FROM travel_itineraries WHERE destination='Paris';
SELECT accommodation_name, price FROM accommodation_details WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT user_id, destination FROM favorite_destinations WHERE user_id=1 ORDER BY destination;
SELECT * FROM travel_itineraries ORDER BY destination DESC;
SELECT accommodation_name, location, price FROM accommodation_details WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT destination, start_date, end_date FROM travel_itineraries WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, destination FROM favorite_destinations WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY destination ASC;
SELECT budget_id, destination, budget_amount FROM trip_budget WHERE budget_amount < 5000 ORDER BY budget_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM travel_itineraries;
SELECT destination, start_date, end_date FROM travel_itineraries ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM accommodation_details WHERE location = 'Paris';
SELECT itinerary_id, airline, flight_number FROM flights WHERE flight_id > 100 ORDER BY airline;
SELECT expense_type, amount FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM accommodation_details WHERE itinerary_id = 1 ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT destination, start_date, end_date FROM travel_itineraries WHERE start_date >= '2022-08-01';
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE itinerary_id IN (SELECT itinerary_id FROM travel_itineraries WHERE destination = 'Paris');
SELECT activity_name, activity_date FROM activities WHERE itinerary_id = 3 AND activity_date >= '2022-09-15' ORDER BY activity_date;
SELECT expense_id, expense_type, amount FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
